title: Thousands of anti-abortion activists hit DC for annual March for Life rally
description: Thousands participated in the 49th annual rally in DC.

		Thousands of anti-abortion activists hit DC for annual March for Life rally	


		By
		


				Social Links for			
			Alex Mead		





View Author Archive




Get author RSS feed


































		Thanks for contacting us. We've received your submission.	

		Back to Reading	







Published 
Jan. 21, 2022, 5:04 p.m. ET









1 of 19









 






					Thousands of anti-abortion activists march along Constitution Avenue during the 49th annual March for Life rally on January 21, 2022 in Washington, DC. 				

					Getty Images				





2 of 19









 






					The rally draws activists from around the country who are calling on the U.S. Supreme Court to overturn the Roe v. Wade decision that legalized abortion nationwide. 				

					AP				





3 of 19









 






					Police officers ride on motorbikes as people attend the annual "March for Life", in Washington, U.S., January 21, 2022.				

					REUTERS				











 







4 of 19









 






					People participate in the March for Life on Capitol Hill in Washington.				

					AP				





5 of 19









 






					Anti-abortion activists march to the Supreme Court during the 49th annual March for Life .				

					Getty Images				





6 of 19









 






					People attend the March for Life rally on the National Mall in Washington, Friday, Jan. 21, 2022. 				

					AP				











 







7 of 19









 






					People attend the March for Life rally on the National Mall in Washington, Friday, Jan. 21, 2022. 				

					AP				





8 of 19









 






					Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene, R-Ga., waves as she walks off of the stage during the March for Life rally on the National Mall in Washington.				

					AP				





9 of 19









 






					Rep. Dan Crenshaw, R-Texas, waves as he is introduced along with other members of Congress who are anti-abortion, at the March for Life rally on the National Mall in Washington.				

					AP				











 







10 of 19









 






					People attend the March for Life rally on the National Mall in Washington, Friday, Jan. 21, 2022. 				

					AP				





11 of 19









 






					Rep. Julia Letlow, R-La., standing with other anti-abortion Senators and Representatives, speaks at the March for Life rally.				

					AP				





12 of 19









 






					People participate in the March for Life outside the U.S. Supreme Court on Capitol Hill.				

					AP				











 







13 of 19









 






					Pro-life activists march during the 49th annual March for Life.				

					AFP via Getty Images				





14 of 19









 






					People participate in the March for Life outside the U.S. Supreme Court on Capitol Hill.				

					AFP via Getty Images				





15 of 19









 






					Pro-life activists march during the 49th annual March for Life, on January 21, 2022, in Washington, DC.				

					AFP via Getty Images				











 







16 of 19









 






					People participate in the March for Life outside the U.S. Supreme Court on Capitol Hill.				

					Getty Images				





17 of 19









 






					People participate in the March for Life outside the U.S. Supreme Court on Capitol Hill.				

					AFP via Getty Images				





18 of 19









 






					eople hold banners and flags as they walk during the annual "March for Life", in Washington, U.S., January 21, 2022.				

					REUTERS				











 







19 of 19









 






					Pro-life activists march during the 49th annual March for Life, on January 21, 2022, in Washington, DC. 				

					AFP via Getty Images
